page.title: 14Christmas Customs
page.content: At{Christmas}we decorate {Christmas trees}with tinsel, coloured balls, sweets and a star or angel right at the top. We also go to church. The church is decorated with holly and other plants. There is a stable with Joseph, Mary and the baby Jesus. We usually go to Midnight Mass, this is on{Christmas eve}at midnight. Then we go home,when we wake_up in the morning we find small presents in our stockings or pillowcases. Then we go downstairs for breakfast and a walk before opening our big presents under the tree. For lunch we have a big{Christmas {turkey}with lots of stuffing and roast potatoes. For afters we have{Christmas {pudding}with plenty of brandy. After that we have crackers and cheese.
